articles.title: Chevy Corvette ZR1 Cleanly Smokes Ferrari And Lamborghini In A Race - CarBuzz
articles.description: The Chevy Corvette ZR1 is yet again a worthy contender against European exotics, particularly from Italy.
articles.content: Owners of the latest Chevrolet Corvette ZR1 will get their hands on the American supercar soon. And while they can't really make a profit out of it - at least not immediately - the ZR1 nameplate has … [+3051 chars]

articles.author: Jeff Spry
articles.title: Why is the European Space Agency beaming a waltz at NASA's Voyager 1 probe this weekend? - Space
articles.description: Saturday's celestial concert salutes ESA's 50th anniversary and 200th birthday of Johann Strauss II.
articles.content: With its sweeping tempo and ethereal melody, Austrian composer Johann Strauss II's "The Blue Danube" waltz has become synonymous with outer space and science fiction ever since it was chosen by Stanl… [+3395 chars]
